channel.title: CVE Feed for psf -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for psf -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-35195|2024-05-20T20:14:48.206Z -- psf -- requests
item.description: Requests is a HTTP library. Prior to 2.32.0, when making requests through a Requests `Session`, if the first request is made with `verify=False` to disable cert verification, all subsequent requests to the same host will continue to ignore cert verification regardless of changes to the value of `verify`. This behavior will continue for the lifecycle of the connection in the connection pool. This vulnerability is fixed in 2.32.0.
